segments.text: I haven't played chess for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right , I'm a beginner . I've just learnt how to play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , there's a chessboard . Those two men have already finished playing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really , but once I won a prize .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So did I . I won a prize last week but it was a prize for beginners .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My prize was for the best player in the country . Now let's start playing chess seriously .
segments.speaker: S2
